participant_1.name: Jenna
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, Jenna enjoys finding unique experiences to share on social media. She has a playful side and loves to indulge in nostalgia.
participant_1.background: I live with my pug and watch CSI to relax. It's important for my Instagram posts to look like I'm having fun. I want to learn how to fly an airplane. I like to eat at the diner down the street because it reminds me of my childhood. I like watching UFC fights.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Resilient and resourceful, Tom has a rich life experience and finds joy in creativity. He values independence and often seeks solace in nature.
participant_2.background: I love going on long bike rides in the woods, but I don't tell my parents because they worry about me getting hurt. I have been married five times. I escaped and later became a carpenter. Sometimes I go to yoga classes. I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.

content.text: Nice to meet you. What kind of things do you like to do?
I like to go on long bike rides in the woods, but I don't tell my parents because they worry about me getting hurt.
That sounds like a lot of fun. Do you ever go on any other types of adventures?
I once escaped from a burning building and later became a carpenter.
Wow, that sounds like a really intense experience. What made you want to become a carpenter?
I wanted to have a trade that would allow me to work on my own and be creative.
That's awesome. I'm sure you're very talented.
I'm not sure about that, but I do enjoy it.
Well, it sounds like you're a very interesting person.
Thank you. I like to think so.
I'm sure you'll find a great home with plenty of space for your sewing supplies.
Thanks, I hope so. I'm looking forward to moving in.
